abstract: 'The training was hard and intense, for which I was very pleased during battle, knowing it helped me get through'.
description: As a veteran who served in Normandy during World War II, Ralph Basson takes us on a sensory tour of war. In this, Ralph highlights the things you cling to in order to survive. 'With all the chaos going on around you, you have to remember your training and just put one foot in front of the other'.
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: Compilation title; B2001960; In our words: stories from Victorian veterans [April 2010]; Active; 2010
